meanings.sent1: She comparts her jewelry into different boxes.
meanings.sent2: The toolbox comparts the screws and nails neatly.
meanings.sent3: The chef comparts the ingredients like a magician with tricks up his sleeve.
meanings.sent4: His mind comparts memories into neat little boxes, each with its own label.
meanings.sent5: The organizer comparts chaos into order with precision and care.

meanings.definition: To separate into sections or categories.
meanings.sent1: He comparts his books by genre on the shelves.
meanings.sent2: The folders comparts the documents based on their importance.
meanings.sent3: The teacher comparts the students into groups for the project.
meanings.sent4: The artist comparts colors like a rainbow bursting into the sky.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle pieces comparts themselves into a beautiful picture when assembled.
